body:
## What's Changed
* ⚠️ **MAJOR CHANGE** ⚠️ use file name instead of checksum to check whether a migration was run by @olivierdalang in https://github.com/opengisch/pum/pull/81
* fix : do not ignore trigger on views by @olivierdalang in https://github.com/opengisch/pum/pull/100
* make check honor --exclude-schema for indexes, constraints, sequences and triggers too by @olivierdalang in https://github.com/opengisch/pum/pull/102
* verbose output for pum test-and-upgrade on CI by @olivierdalang in https://github.com/opengisch/pum/pull/91
* show trace on exception in upgrade (when verbose flag is set) by @olivierdalang in https://github.com/opengisch/pum/pull/101

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/opengisch/pum/compare/0.9.14...0.10.0

Fixes :

- `pum --version` returning [DEV] instead of actual version

name: bugfix release
body:
Fixes :

- pum check ignoring parameter-less function

name: bugfix release
body:
Fixes :
- pum check returning false positives on triggers

name: bugfix release
body:
Fixes :
- more readable output of pum check
- failure on pum info

name: fix handling of errors in restore

body:
Prevent running twice the same baseline
Verbose mode

name: fix default value for var as none

body: allow default value when getting variable

name: accept variables in Python delta files

body:
Fix ordering of deltas by name.
Requires Python 3.6+

name: Variables for SQL deltas and max version
body:
New arguments for upgrades:
-v for variables to be used in SQL deltas
-u for maximum version to run the deltas up to

name: Option to skip schema in checker
pg_restore exit on error, no owner
Pre scripts in reverse order
body: Execute the pre scripts in reverse order. Assuming that the list of delta dirs is [delta1, delta2] it means that the pre scripts of delta2 are executed before the pre scripts of delta1.

name: Change DeltaPy.delta_dir return
body: Instead of having DeltaPy.delta_dir return the first delta dir in the list let's return the delta_dir into which the delta file is actually stored. This is much more useful to DeltaPy subclasses.

name: Output file and delta sorting
body:
- Add output_file option to `pum check` command
- Sort deltas by name within groups
